name: Ox Warrior
description:
Game introduction


Basic gameplay Players need to control mechanical warriors in an arena to fight endless battles with the enemy. The game has very rich operability and can perform operations such as jumping, rolling, sprinting, shooting, and dropping bombs.
Characteristic part As the game progresses, medical kits and guns can be continuously displayed in the scene. Whenever the game is tired, you can enter the movie part of the main interface and take off the clothes of the character. Watching the movie inside can definitely bring you a relaxed and happy mood.
